serverConfig: {"mcpServers":{"ibkr-mcp-server":{"command":"uvx","args":["--from","iflow-mcp_arjundivecha_ibkr-mcp-server","iflow-mcp-arjundivecha-ibkr-mcp-server"],"env":{"IBKR_HOST":"127.0.0.1","IBKR_PORT":"7497","IBKR_CLIENT_ID":"1","IBKR_IS_PAPER":"true"},"values":{"IBKR_HOST":{"type":"string","description":"IBKR TWS/Gateway host address","default":"127.0.0.1"},"IBKR_PORT":{"type":"string","description":"IBKR TWS/Gateway port (7497=paper, 7496=live, 4001=gateway)","default":"7497"},"IBKR_CLIENT_ID":{"type":"string","description":"IBKR client ID","default":"1"},"IBKR_IS_PAPER":{"type":"string","description":"Whether to use paper trading account","default":"true"}}}}}
